response_parsed.title: Deploying Serverless Handlers Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to create and deploy a serverless API using FastAPI, uvicorn, and AWS Lambda in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Install required packages: FastAPI, Uvicorn, Typer, Boto3, and AWS SAM CLI
Create a new FastAPI application with your API endpoints
Configure the entrypoint file for AWS Lambda using the Typer library
Package your project as an AWS SAM template
Deploy the serverless application on AWS using AWS SAM CLI
Invoke and test your deployed API using the AWS Lambda function URL

code_examples.code:
from fastapi import FastAPI, Depends
app = FastAPI()
def create_app():
    app = FastAPI()
    return app

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for the latest FastAPI features and AWS Lambda compatibility
Uvicorn v0.17 or later is recommended for running FastAPI applications in serverless mode
caveats: Make sure to adjust your AWS Lambda function configuration (memory, timeout, etc.) based on the complexity of your API
AWS SAM CLI requires AWS credentials to be properly configured before deployment
